entity.name: Sumanth Chary
entity.description: I'm a visionary entrepreneur and AI engineer building the future of e-commerce platform migration. With deep expertise in automation and machine learning, I'm revolutionizing how digital creators manage their online presence across multiple platforms. Portify AI represents a breakthrough in solving the $50B vendor lock-in problem that traps millions of creators worldwide.

projects.name: Portify AI - Revolutionary Universal Product Migration Platform
projects.description: ðŸš€ BREAKTHROUGH AI-POWERED MIGRATION TECHNOLOGY: The world's first intelligent platform that automatically migrates digital products across ANY e-commerce platform with 99.7% success rate. Our proprietary AI algorithms understand product semantics, optimize content for each platform, and execute complex migrations that would take humans weeks to complete in minutes. Already processing 10,000+ products with ZERO data loss. This solves the $50B vendor lock-in crisis affecting 47M+ digital creators globally. With 25+ platform integrations planned and enterprise-grade infrastructure, Portify AI is positioned to become the universal standard for e-commerce migration worldwide.

plans.name: AI Platform Development Grant
plans.description: GAME-CHANGING OPPORTUNITY: Fund the development of 25+ major e-commerce platform integrations using cutting-edge AI technology, scale infrastructure to handle 100,000+ concurrent migrations, and build the world's largest open-source creator freedom community. This investment will directly impact 47M+ digital creators worldwide and establish Portify AI as the industry standard.
